title: Get a feed for a user
name: GetFeed
description: Retrieves a set of feed items for a specific user

examples.title: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
   [
     {
         "post": "247455fe-0e8e-4e3f-af4d-458ac13508b8",
         "content": "HELLO WORLD!",
         "user": {
             "user": "cbeab41d-2372-4017-ac50-d8d63802d452",
             "username": "cliftonc"
         },
         "posted": "2015-01-18T20:37:32.626Z",
         "type": "post",
         "timeuuid": "d4065671-9f51-11e4-889d-9f08914a01c0",
         "date": "2015-01-18T20:37:32.631Z",
         "fromNow": "a few seconds ago",
         "fromFollow": false,
         "isLike": false,
         "isPost": true,
         "isFollow": false,
         "isFriend": false
     },
     {
       "friend": "7b3891d8-cc27-4284-8fb4-d3b455186f99",
       "user": {
           "user": "cbeab41d-2372-4017-ac50-d8d63802d452",
           "username": "cliftonc"
       },
       "user_friend": "cbeab41d-2372-4017-ac50-d8d63802d452",
       "since": "2015-01-18T20:36:38.632Z",
       "username_friend": "cliftonc",
       "type": "friend",
       "timeuuid": "b3d781d0-9f51-11e4-889d-9f08914a01c0",
       "date": "2015-01-18T20:36:38.637Z",
       "fromNow": "5 minutes ago",
       "fromFollow": false,
       "isLike": false,
       "isPost": false,
       "isFollow": false,
       "isFriend": true
   }
   ]

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to retrieve the news feed for a user.

examples.title: Bad-Request:
Not-Found:
Server-Error:

title: Add a follower to a user
name: AddFollower
description: Adds a new friend to a user account.

Parameter.description: the guid of the user to become friends with

examples.title: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{"status":"OK"}

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to create and retrieve follows.

title: Add a like by a user
name: AddLike
description: Creates a new like of an item

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl --data "username=cliftonc&item=github.com" http://localhost:3000/like

Parameter.description: a canonical url to the item liked

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to create and retrieve likes.

examples.title: Bad-Request:
Bad-Request:
Not-Found:
Server-Error:

title: Get a specific like
name: GetLike

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -i http://localhost:3000/like/cliftonc/github.com

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to create and retrieve likes.
